entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -17.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -23.4°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
